FileFormat.FormatDescription: The CHAT Transcription Format provides a format for producing computerised transcripts of face-to-face conversations. ‘CHAT’ is an acronym for Codes for the Human Analysis of Transcripts. CHAT is the standard transcription system for the TalkBank and CHILDES (Child Language Data Exchange System) Projects. https://talkbank.org/manuals/CHAT.pdf

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF, Offset 0, Max Offset 256, using 4 mandatory elements, although there are some additional non-mandatory elements that may also appear near BOF: ‘@UTF8’ {0-256} ‘@Begin’ {0-64} ‘@Languages:’ {0-256} ‘@Participants:’ – see https://talkbank.org/manuals/CHAT.pdf. As such these relative offsets between elements may need to be adjusted as more examples of this format are encountered.
